purpose: Coarse molecular candidate generation and domain presets. Not a substitute for HITRAN/ExoMol line-by-line data.

upstream_sources.name: HITRAN
upstream_sources.intended_use: Atmospheric and laboratory molecular spectroscopy; line-by-line and cross-sections.
upstream_sources.notes: Use HAPI/HITRANonline export in a preprocessing pipeline for precision libraries.

upstream_sources.name: ExoMol
upstream_sources.type: molecular line lists for hot atmospheres
upstream_sources.intended_use: Exoplanets, brown dwarfs, cool stars, hot atmospheres; line lists and cross-sections/opacities.
upstream_sources.notes: Prefer temperature-dependent cross-sections/opacities for low/medium-resolution frontend workflows.

caveats: Band anchors are approximate and curated for coarse candidate generation.
Many molecules have dense line forests; use line-by-line / cross-section verification before final identification.
Visible-band entries for some hot species are observationally useful anchors but not exhaustive.
